long.ar,es,es_419,ja,pt_BR,pt_PT:

âš¡ Lightning-Fast Ads: Experience ads at 16x speed. Donâ€™t let commercials slow you down.

ğŸš§ AdBlocker Integration - Use this alongside your existing AdBlockers with no issues!
ğŸ“ƒYouTube Video Summarizer - Summarize the YouTube Video using ChatGPT
